review:
At first I thought it was some average movie but I kept on watching it, took my attention. The acting is superb, hats off!!!
And it sends a great message to everyone that a mother has infinite love for her family especially her children, I mean I literally cried watching the last scenes.
I'd recommend everyone to watch this movie with their family and enjoy your life to the fullest.
Great film with awesome storyline. Hats off Shekhar Suman for the great movie.
I hope this movie will not remain underrated. One of the greatest movies of all time.
One of the best but underrated movie.All the performance are gr8. Very emotional movie.
Even though its plot was copied from the Hollywood movie Awake but still the story told in the end is something we have heard in our childhood day
Very good plot of this movie direction and music is superb
Awesome movie but I am feeling sad that this is underrated
